how to change invoice template?

To change the invoice template in Xero, follow these steps:  1. Click on the organization name and select Settings.  2. Click on Invoice settings.  3. Find the template you want to update and click Options, then select Edit.  4. Make the desired changes to the template, such as updating contact details, invoice terms, or payment details.  5. Click Save to save the changes.  Now, the invoice template has been successfully changed.
